net.dean.jraw.http

Class SubmissionRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.http.SubmissionRequest

  • public class SubmissionRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Models the parameters of a call to /comments/{article}.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SubmissionRequest.Builder 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SubmissionRequest(java.lang.String id)
      Creates a SubmissionRequest who only specifies the link's ID.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SubmissionRequest

        public SubmissionRequest(java.lang.String id)
        Creates a SubmissionRequest who only specifies the link's ID.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Gets the submission's ID, such as "92dd8".

      • getDepth

        public java.lang.Integer getDepth()
        Gets the maximum amount of subtrees returned by this request. If the number is less than 1, it is ignored by the Reddit API and no depth restriction is enacted.

      • getLimit

        public java.lang.Integer getLimit()
        Gets the maximum amount of comments to return

      • getContext

        public java.lang.Integer getContext()
        Gets the number of parents shown in relation to the focused comment. For example, if the focused comment is in the eighth level of the comment tree (meaning there are seven replies above it), and the context is set to six, then the response will also contain the six direct parents of the given comment. For a better understanding, play with this link.

      • getSort

        public CommentSort getSort()
        Gets the sorting for the comments in the response
        Returns:
        This SubmissionRequest

      • getFocus

        public java.lang.String getFocus()
        Gets the ID of the comment to focus on. If this comment does not exist, then this parameter is ignored. Otherwise, only one comment tree is returned: the one in which the given comment resides.
